snippet: David Denby, a film critic for The New Yorker since 1998, will write “longer critic-at-large pieces” on films, books and other topics, according to the magazine.
abstract: David Denby, New Yorker magazine film critic since 1998, will leave that post in early 2015, but will remain as staff writer.
lead_paragraph: David Denby, a film critic for The New Yorker since 1998, will write “longer critic-at-large pieces” on films, books and other topics, according to the magazine.

headline.seo: David Denby to Step Down as New Yorker Film Critic
headline.main: New Yorker Film Critic Shifts to Staff Writer
headline.print_headline: New Yorker Film Critic Shifts to Staff Writer
